text: Allaha jene satyamarga batave te to satyamarga para che ane jene te margathi pathabhrasta kari de, asakya che ke tame teni madada karanara tena sivaya bija ko'ine ju'o, ava lokone ame kayamatana divase undha modhe kari da'isum, te loko andhala, munga ane bahera hase, temanum thekanum jahannama hase, jyare pana te (aga) thandi padava lagase, ame temana mate te (aga)ne vadhum bhadakavi da'isum
